summary: A simple retex of Caliente\'s Mod V0-1-2666-2-1
descriptionHtml:
Nadezhda\'s Nail Polish!
=======================================
Hey fellow ladies! Are you a mage? or just prefer sandals over boots? perchance you like no shoes at all!
Well now there is a reaosn to enjoy the latter in Skyrim!
A simple retex of Caliente\'s Mod V0-1-2666-2-1

I have toned down the colors to a more natural look. The green is darker, the pink isn\'t so loud
Red has been added as a nailpolish color

I will be re-adding Naval rings and a variety of Tats in a little bit, my little princess would like some dinner and time with her mommy.

==============================================
Requirements:
Caliente\'s CBBE mod V0-1-2666-2-1
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

This mod was made using the Body, Feet & Hands Variation of his Mods, Not the slim version!

==============================================
Installation
Download Caliente\'s CBBE Mod
then download my mod, pick your color and install, you only have to replace one file...because mine is just a simple
retex ^^ 
Play Skyrim and enjoy your new painted toenails and fingernails :D

==============================================
to do!
Add more colors
Create a his res hand tex
Add some Tattoos to the empty canvas that is your body(gimme ideas :D)


==============================================
Credit goes out to:
Aknot! - For original Inspiration
Caliente! - For the awesome body mods
Phygit! - for the beautiful feet
==============================================

Note: This and the mods listed above may contain nudity!
I\'m not a barbie doll, and neither is my character :)
author: Nadezhda90
